fields.description: The blob path must begin with the pattern provided for trigger to fire. For example, '/records/blobs/december/' will only fire the trigger for blobs in the december folder under the records container. At least one of these must be provided: blobPathBeginsWith, blobPathEndsWith.
fields.name: BlobPathBeginsWith

fields.description: The blob path must end with the pattern provided for trigger to fire. For example, 'december/boxes.csv' will only fire the trigger for blobs named boxes in a december folder. At least one of these must be provided: blobPathBeginsWith, blobPathEndsWith.
fields.name: BlobPathEndsWith

fields.description: The type of events that cause this trigger to fire.
fields.name: Events

fields.description: If set to true, blobs with zero bytes will be ignored.
fields.name: IgnoreEmptyBlobs

fields.description: The ARM resource ID of the Storage Account.
fields.name: Scope
